content.detailedDescription:
This is the second report regarding ufo 2 from the egyptian pharaohnic fleet of three flying saucers following each others and separated for final headed destinations.This one was started to appear same time with the first one at exactelly 21.53.49 hour (pm),but was unable to record it as the panasonic camera was recording the first one till disappeared,then started to record at 22.01.00 hour till 22.13 hour on the same tape for the period of 11 minutes total recorded for this second one.
it was following stable orbit from southeast to southeast and to south east headed for steps pyramid of saqqara.
please continueing with me for the next report regarding the third ufo.
content.summary: Hello again....This is dr.Ibrahim again sendeng this short report from cairo.Egypt....-as soon as i just finished updating my web site:www.Ufo-egyptian-hunter.Org-and added the fresh ufo footages in our area-and still having around ten cases not been yet

content.detailedDescription:
Three ufo from the egyptian pharaohnic fleet of three flying saucers.
this is the first one:-starting to record by panasonic video camera at 21.37.37 hour .For period of 0.19.13 minutes.Finshed recording at 22.0 hours..All pm same day june 20 2007.
weather was very fair .Moon was crecent shape.
noticed and recorded on the tape an airliner in a high altitude than the object?? but noticed no affect.Route was from southeast to northwest in a very stable orbit ,but was goining down and down till appeared like a mushroom and disapeared from vision.No available informations about attempted for landing.Orbit was flying over river nile and heading to giza pyramids.
content.summary: Hello again....This is dr.Ibrahim again sendeng this short report from cairo.Egypt....-as soon as i just finished updating my web site:www.Ufo-egyptian-hunter.Org-and added the fresh ufo footages in our area-and still having around ten cases not been yet

content.detailedDescription: My partner & i were just falling off to sleep.  in answer to the question: "what made you first notice it?", this is the odd part...I was turning over to go to sleep, but for some reason, i turned and looked out the window, instead, without thinking about doing so. my gaze was directly at an orange ball of light moving across the tree tops, coming towards us (and the highway).  i said to my partner:  "hey, look at that, do you see that?" he was half asleep, and a little irritated, but i don't know if he really did look, as i was fixed on the 'object' although i hesitate to call it that, as it did not have any 'physical' appearance.  his reply to me was:  "yah, it's probably the moom." he went back to sleep.  'it' suddenly stopped dead and hung in mid-air.  when that happenned, i said again to him:  "hey, it stopped!"  there was no reply from him, but as soon as i got the words out, it started to float upwards--straight up, but moving slow, like a balloon would, until it was out of sight.  the appearance was of a round, orange light. i thought the object was:  an orange ball of light, which was what it appeared to be, but then i started to think that maybe it was a satellite (although it was way bigger)or something else? my 1st reaction was to share the sighting, i was just a little uneasy. my 2nd reaction was:  'this is different from the many others i've seen' i was curious, and astounded, and bewildered all at the same time.  also a little frustrated, because i don't know what these lights are.  i've seen over 10 in the last 17 yrs--all different.  it also made me feel a little 'eerie', as it moved as soon as i spoke...Like i had the sense 'it' heard me. that's when i thought it might be a 'listening device' or something, being tested by who-knows-who, in this isolated, rural area.  but that doesn't really 'fit', as it was not a solid object...Just a globe of light.  because it was orange, it reminded me of two other sightings...An orange aura of light seemingly coming from the ground in the woods behind the house, and two foot-ball shaped lights, flying in tandam (like they were 'linked' invisibly overhead for 10 mins.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A ball of orange light, but with no 'fireball' appearance, about 100x the size of a distant star.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 7:55pm on thursday, june 21st, i began to hear loud, military-sounding helicopters flying back and forth above my home.   this occurred three times within ten minutes.   i never did get up to look for them as i'm quite used to hearing helicopters flying between jackson and the michigan international speedway in brooklyn (i live between those two points, just beyond the nw edge of clark lake).

finally, after the third time i grabbed my sony dsc-h5 cybershot (7+ megapixel digital slr).   nothing occurred between 8:10 and 8:30pm.   i went outdoors and set my camera on a flimsy tripod to photograph the moon.   i snapped a few when i became acutely aware of a presence.   i began to snap pix into the sky with the camera with manual settings.   i zoomed optically approx. 5x and had a 2x telephoto lens attached.

the zoom was not adjusted during the dozens of photographs i took into the sky...The fstop and 'shutter' speed were adjusted manually to shoot into the early evening blue sky.

the image with the blurry spot was taken first...I visually saw a black object flying west to east and caught one photograph of it before it disappeared behind the numerous trees on my property.    it moved very quickly and its general swaying from side to side while travelling made me think of a balloon blowing in the wind.  this was way too fast for that...   the image with the cigar shaped object was one of many taken in quick succession (generally one to five seconds apart) but the only one with this object.   i also photographed a commercial jet with the same zoom setting if you would like for me to send that one as a comparison.  i did not visually see the cigar shaped object.
content.summary: Repeatedly heard military helicopters and later photographed fast moving disc and cigar

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch about 10pm one summer night a couple of years ago. i had been sitting out there with my wife kimmie for a couple of hours when a ball of light appeared far away in the northern sky. at first i thought the light was a shooting star but it continued to draw closer and closer until it was hovering what seemed to be a few miles to the north of my house. it continued to hover for what seemed to be forever, seemingly watching and waiting for us to make a move. the fireball was very bright and flashed colors of orange, yellow, and blue from its fiery depths. we were scared at first sighting but a calmness came over us and we were fascinated by the unidentified flying object. when the object disappeared into the starry night, we were in disbelief at what had just happened. we now know we are not alone. we know deep in our hearts that there are other lifeforms out there just watching and waiting to make their move on us.
content.summary: I was sitting in my rocking chair on my front porch one summer night when a fireball type object appeared in the northern sky. the fireball was large and appeared to be focusing on my farm. after a few minutes the fireball released beams of light.

content.detailedDescription: On the right side of the moon, a bright (look a like)a star aprove 10 inch of with
content.summary: A bright star

content.detailedDescription: It was cool....
content.summary: The 2 lights were the space shuttle and the space station...10:52 over detroit....Watched it, knew it was coming...

content.detailedDescription:
Black triangle was hovering over treetops. it had 3 lights, and absolutely no noise. the exact location of shelton elementary school and cedercrest rd.

we stopped in the middle of the road, because it was unlike anything we've ever seen.  we watched it for about 30 seconds and rolled the windows down in the car. no noise, no movement from the craft.

the situation was odd and we decided to leave promptly because we were nearly(70yrds away) directly under it.

i regret not taking photos, but i didn't have a camera.
content.summary: Black triangle hovering 20 feet over treetops

content.detailedDescription: While traveling east on 422 toward robesonia, i spotted a bright light in the northern part of the sky. at first it looked like how venus looks at night shining very brightly. the sky was very blue and no clouds were present in its area of sight. next the object started to "uncloak" its self, it appeared to be in the shape of a cylinder that was a shiney and metalic in its form. i tried to keep my eyes on the road and on the object, but just as it appeared it vanished clear out of sight. i could not gage its size or how high up it was in the sky.
content.summary: Flying object spotted in eastern pa

content.detailedDescription: I don't like reports without photos but i'm sure this one will be reported by someone who does have some.  what looked like an extremely bright head light on a jet approached my house from the west.  i live on powell butte, a point in the pdx flight pattern that jets use to line up for the air port.  as it came closer it did not reveal the normal details of a jet and just as i was about to write it off as reflection, a commercial jet came into view at lower altitude and just behind the ball.  then the ball and jet passed almost directly overhead.  at no time, or angle, did the ball exhibit any detail other than light, it was completely consistent at all angles.  it was clear to me that the pilot of the jet was carefully pursuing the object at an altitude and angle that allowed them a visual through their front windshield.  as the two of them continued east, another very large jetliner appeared out of the south at very low altitude, almost at the tree tops, and was obviously avoiding a collision as the other jet and ball of light passed directly over it.  at that point the first jet veered out of the normal landing pattern.  there is no way that the airline pilots of both planes did not get a good long look at this thing, and considering it flew right down the middle of a major pdx flight pattern i'm sure the tower saw it as well.  this is not the first time i have seen this thing/s but because of the reference the jets provided, and the actions they took, i am certain it was not a conventional craft.
content.summary: Low flying ball of light in close proximity to jet airliners

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to work aboard camp pendleton, coming back from my lunch break. when i noticed something shiny up in the sky. before i went to lunch i saw that there was a retirement ceremony across the street. it was filled with cars and people. when i came back everything was done. there was hardly anyone in the field and most of the cars in the parking lot were gone. anyway, so i glanced up and saw this shiny object in the sky. it was kind of long, horizontally. because i was driving i couldn't really see if it was moving or not...And i couldn't really keep staring at it because i didn't want to run into another car. when i finally pulled into my work parking lot i looked up into the sky and didn't see anything, just blue sky. i mentioned it to one of my co-workers and she said it was probably a balloon. i'm not really sure what it was...There's a possibility it was a balloon, because of the ceremony a few minutes before, but it could have also been an ufo. not sure, but it was interesting. hope i get to see more in the near future!!
content.summary: Shiny object in the sky
content.locationName: Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton, California

content.detailedDescription:
Living within the 3 mile perimiter of the airport and base it is easy to recognize when air traffic has halted for the evening. 
after dinner i typically sit in front of the house with the dog and smoke. this night we wrapped up dinner a little late 7:45 pm and off to the store i went for ciggs . a 2 minute drive up the block and back. i always open my window unless it is raining. it is during this short trip that i recognized the lack of commercial air traffic . even the the base was unusually quite . the routine testing of the osprey's for some reason was not going on this evening . very quite.
the big sky here was partially lit with a sliver of reflective moon. and the clouds were sparse. as usual many stars and planets viewable to the eye . 
as i pullled up in my van facing south returning from the store i noticed an unusually large ultra bright orb west of albuquerque over the plains. i stood in my driveway for about 2 minutes watching this large bright orb track its way steadily eastward towards the downtown area. taking in to account the environment of the evening i watched and calculated very carefully for strobes , colors and even the autoenomic effect playing tricks on my eyes  it was clear to me that this was in the lower proximity of the atmosphere and was not man made>? i hollored for my partner irene to come quickly and watch > on the couch with the door open she was only 20 ' away and came out to observe this object with me for the next 4~5 minutes.
she too was in amazement as it tracked over the city and towards the a/f base. i spoke freely at the time that its shape was unusual and the light it was emmitting was not at all normal . she concurrred and we continued to wath it track slowly eastward.

this is the clincher>!

as we observed we heard the engines of air force fighter jets ramping up to take off > as this occured the object halted mid path (we gasped at the same time) and vertically ascended / exited the air space as it dissipated its glow. it was not of this earth. 
1st time report 3rd life sighting.
1st time 1976 or so > connetquot river state park. long island about 9pm
2nd time port washington ny 2005 3a.M giant oil refinery type craft darker then the night creating a silhouette, after spotting the object once again i called to irene who not only witnessed this object with me but also witnessed the military craft in hot persuit of this huge object.

gary l weiss 
music teacher / audio engineer 
technology systems integrator
505-265-3065
content.summary: Airport and kirtland base within 1 mile . unusually quite that evening except when the fighters took off to persue this oblect .

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the basement of my house trying to find my second garage door opener for my dad, who was working on his car. my mother was outside, sitting on a chair in the driveway. when i came outside, i see my neighbor at the fence with her boyfriend. she's telling me to look up at the sky, because there were some lights she didn't recognize as a plane.

i look up and see two lights that look like stars about two inches apart moving in the sky. i turned to tell my mother to look up at it, when i looked back the lights where there for just a split second before they disappeared. it seemed like one light went out before the other, but it's hard to say. my neighbor and her boyfriend said they had been watching the lights for a while before coming over to the fence to look for me. her boyfriend said that at one point he could see stars between the two lights, like seeing through something. i think that meant he figured each light was independant of the other. i think they were part of the same structure, personally. i only saw the lights move slightly in the sky by the time i looked up, and it appeared in unison, suggesting a craft of some sort. i first thought the two lights were stars when i looked up, but stars don't move or disappear, obviously.

my father was in the garage the whole time, but there were four witnesses altogether. me, my mother, my neighbor and her boyfriend. we all saw it. we have an airport not too far away from dearborn in romulus, that frequently attracts a lot of air traffic over our area. but this had no faa red lights on it and made no noise. we are savvy enough to know what are planes, and what aren't. the whole experience for me lasted probably 10 seconds. for my neigbors it lasted longer, more like a couple minutes.
content.summary: Two lights in the sky, star-like in their appearance moved across the sky and then disappeared. multiple witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 10:00 pm on the night of june 19th, 2007, my wife and i were putting the recycleables out to the side of the road when i made a comment about venus. i said to her jokingly, "there's the mothership", and we stopped what we were doing and watched the sky. since my last experience in january, i always scan the sky in the evening when i'm out of doors. i noticed a few planes high overhead with flashing lights as usual and there were a few coming in to our airport as usual with their headlights on. i also noticed a commercial craft in the western sky bound for europe i suppose. this plane was high, maybe 35,000 feet or so with it's lights flashing. the international airport is approximately twenty miles away in a north easterly direction and cfb shearwater is most likely the same distance from us but in a south easterly direction.
i became aware of a bright light in the west just above the tree line as though a plane was coming in to land at the airport, (this is a common occurance out here in hammonds plains to see a single bright light in the sky turn into two landing lights),and a short distance behind it i noticed a reddish point. i watched to see if the forward light would become two headlights as is usual for a plane coming in to land but the light remained singular as the light grew in brightness and the one following behind it quickly gave up it's reddish tint and grew bright and starlike also. these lights were almost as large and bright as the planet sitting in the western sky.
my wife and i watched for some minutes as the two starlike objects moved across the sky maintaining the same speed and direction (wnw to sse) and altitude until they passed beyond the treeline in the south southeast. there were no engine sounds or flashing lights associated with these objects. they were still very bright as the approached the southeastern sky.
my first thought was that they might be military aircraft going to cfb shearwater or overseas. i've seen military craft escorting other craft before in the daytime sky, maintaining the same distance from one another.
my wife and i were puzzeled to say the least and were hopeful someone else would have seen this and that it could be explained. we were a little excited but not fearful in the least.
if anyone can explain this "happening" please do.
content.summary: Two star-like objects moved from west-northwesterly direction to south southeasterly direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front porch feeding the birds. a group of seagulls were circling overhead which caused me to look skyward. i observed
a golden spherical object traveling wsw to ene toward lake ontario.The sky was cloudless and the sun had started it's descent.
the object can be best described as a large boulder and was of a brilliant golden color. the sun may have enhanced the color of the object but it had a clearly defined shape, not a blurry one that would be caused by light reflection. there was no sound or vapor trail.
it was traveling much faster than an aircraft or a satellite but slower than  a meteorite . it had a definite shape and was only observed for a matter of 5 to 6 seconds. it's speed was such that it disappeared from view in the sky well before it reached the horizon. it is impossible for me to estimate it's altitude but it appeared to be less than that of an overflying aircraft.
this location is approx. 3 nautical miles from john c. munroe international airport and there is a fair amount of traffic at times.It was not traveling in the direction of the airport and would have been at an altitude that would have prevented it from making a landing approach either here or at pearson international in toronto. this is the first time in my 61 years that i have observed an object that i clearly cannot identify and, as a result, was quite excited about.
content.summary: Brilliant golden boulder shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking up the stairs to my apartment when i stopped at the top to look down in the direction of a guy walking away.  when i looked up almost overhead i saw 2 identical white "lights" traveling at the same speed, constant with each other and never veering during the time i saw them.  that was when i felt very dizzy for some bizarre reason and it occurred to me that they were not planes or shooting stars.  there were no flashing lights or any variance in the bright glow of them.

after about 30 seconds of slow but constant straight movement the one in what might be considered the front began to fade out in bits and pieces.  not just fading as a whole but fading out in bits and pieces.  it seemed that i could detect faint color as it slowly disappeared before my eyes.  then the other one followed suit by also disappearing.  

then they were gone.  i was very excited by the way.
content.summary: 2 round lights disappear

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog, looked up and observed what i would be inclined to believe were 2 tr3a's heading east in an approximate 25 degree climb about 100-200 miles apart, moving at a high rate of speed. they appeared to be making a final burn to sub-orbital altitude. since we only have 2 tr3a's in the known inventory, and they never fly together (too valuable), i must assume i actually saw 2 ufo's. either that, or something very strange and dangerous is afoot...The objects both stopped their burns consecutivley at the same spot in the sky, still on a climbing angle.
content.summary: 2 aircraft making final burn to sub-orbital velocity

content.detailedDescription: No noise was made by two bright yellowish lights that did not flash as they moved nw->se and maintained exactly the same distance from one another, approximately 15 degrees in visual field, above cloud level.  objects were larger than other commercial jet aircraft moving low enough to be heard.
content.summary: Two bright steady lights in tandem moving silently nw->se constant 15 degrees apart

content.detailedDescription: About 9:30 pm was outside and looked up and noticed two star-like objects moving at the same speed.  moving almost in a straight line in east/southeast direction.  first light was a bit brighter than the second.  at arm's length, about 2-3 fingers apart or so, i didn't actuall check at the time- i was still in amazement.  there were no flashing and/or colored lights at all visible, only white light.  i first saw them directly overhead and watched them travel off into the east where some trees blocked my view any further.  the two objects appeared to stay the same distance apart the whole time i watched and were definitely headed the same direction.  i had heard the next evening when i was telling someone else what i had saw and they had asked me if had seen the evening news... i can't find any news stories on this after the fact, but it sounded like i was not the only one who witnessed something odd in the sky that night.
content.summary: Two white lights in unisen traveling eastward direction, with no flashing lights, moving pretty quick, faster than planes normally seen.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of may 19, 2007 at approx. 10:45pm i along with my son and my daughter observed an unidentified flying object.(unidentified to us) we had never seen anything like it. we were sitting on our back porch talking when my son says "what the heck, is that two stars chasing each other"?That description got my attention and i looked in the direction he was pointing which was tree top high and to the left of our view of the western horizon. my son's description was apt.  the  lights were some distance apart and they were rising up  vertically. we yelled for my daughter to come outside to see because i knew as soon as i saw it that it was definitely not like anything i'd ever seen before. we walked from the porch to our yard to keep watching and it kept moving steadily with no sound at all and the lights were steady and bright. it looked to me to be only about 200 ft or so above us as it passed over although it seemed much farther away when we first spotted it. i am of course only geussing but it seemed to be at least as long as a football field but my son thinks it was much larger. the reason i decided it was two lights that were part of a vehicle of some kind is because as it moved the space between the two lights obliterated the stars from our view and also the two lights although far apart were moving in perfect sync. my son, whose vision is better than my own says that he could make out the shape of a long horizontal daimond with the lights positioned at each corner horizontally. i asked my daughter to run back inside to get the video camera from my bedroom .It was almost directly overhead when she brought the camera outside. while she was frantically trying to get the battery on the camera it continued to move in an easterly direction almost directly overhead . i asked my daughter to give me the camera so i could try to get the battery in place finally. i had to look down to do that but i didn't want take my eyes off of it for a second.  i slammed the battery in and looked up to see it's position and it gradually faded away behind some thin misty clouds. i couldn't even tape it's disappearance because i slammed the battery in upside down!! my son said that he could still see it faintly behind the clouds still moving in the same direction and at the same speed but it was gone completely from my sight. i was a little embarrassed but i called the local sherrif's department to report it and also to find out if anyone else had reported anything.  i can tell you one thing for sure it was a very exciting experience. my kids and i feel a little differently. they think it was an alien space ship and are a little scared because after all , why would the aliens fly over their house in particular? i am of the opinion that it was more likely some top secret millitary aircraft and  it makes me angry that the millitary would try to scare their own citizens by performing an alien spaceship flyby. i hope i didn't leave anything out and sorry for the lack of paragrahs. please let me know if anyone else reported a similar sighting or if you can explain to us what it actually was that we saw. thanks in advance if you have any helpful info and also thank you for the opportunity to describe our experience without feeling embarrassed.
content.summary: Two very bright lights not too far apart coming up vertically from the western horizon and travelling at a steady speed then turning horizontally while travelling east almost directly overhead when it gradually faded behind some clouds.

content.detailedDescription: It was a evening in may. clear sky out in the country and two and three star like objects where moving at a fast speed and doing circle loops and triangler loops in the air. they was all over the place. then the came to a stopping hault in the sky and lights came on almost like lights of a cars head lights is what it looked like and it lasted three or four seconds and the just turned off and starting moving in a crazy pattern like they was lost. they would fly real fast to the south and then back real fast to the north then east and west. i cannot explain what it was, after this all took place about fifteen minutes after there was three jets like military loud jets flew over like they spotted something on the radar. it was really weird. last night we say the same three stars again but without the flashing lights. they was coming from the west and just acted like they was playing around in the air again. it wasn't a plane. i am sure of that.Please help me figure out what i saw and my oldest son and husband saw.When all this happened we was sitting in the house and my son came down stairs and said he saw some lights outside his bedroom window, so we went outside and saw nothing at first but then when he saw it again he begged me to come out and look and thats when i saw them.They was like two stars then a third came about.I was stund, scared and freakedout alittle because i couldn't explain what they were. they finally just disappeared after a hour or so.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two star like shapes moving at a fast speed in unstable dirrections and haulting and flashing light.

content.detailedDescription: My mother was outside taking out the garbage. she watched two objects that looked like bright stars travel at a consistent distance from each other yet in tandem with each other across the sky from south to east relatively slowly. she called for me to come outside. she pointed out the objects to me, and i watched them travel. i ran downstairs to get my sister because i have never seen anything like this before. she made it out in time to witness these objects as well. we watched and listened attentively; there were no sounds coming from these objects. we live about a half hour away from detroit metro airport, so we are used to seeing and hearing planes. these were not planes. we continued to watch these objects as a plane looked like it was nearing these two objects. as the plane got closer to the objects, they disappeared! we did not see them again!
content.summary: 2 star-like tandem lights moving from the south to east before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, her family and myself were staying overnight in cumbres pass. my wife's dad read how beautiful and isolated this area was, so we decided to drive the rv up to camp overnight. when we arrived there was only two other campers at this site, no one else was around. earlier that afternoon a truck drove up the rode and turned around and left. i mention that because i heard and got a visual on the truck and you can hear the tires driving on the dirt road, a very regonizable sound. anyway after a few hours of exploring we returned to thr rv for dinner and then bed. we (my family) slept in the back and her parents up front. my daughter wanted to play a game so we did and i remember looking out the window to check the sky. i saw so many stars and the mikly way i could hardly wait to go and check it out. earlier that day i did observe air traffic but at very high altitudes, nothing flying past 35,000 feet. everyone was sleeeping and i was getting ready to go out and that's when i heard a very loud sound, like an jumbo jet flying in for a landing. i live and used to work in the dallas/fort worth area, so i jnow what planes sound like when flying over or approaching for landing. now the sound was low and mechanical and vibrated the rv when it passed by, i looked out the east window and was only able to see lights passing the tree line. because of the trees i wasn't able to get a very look. i ran out but what ever it was had passed on behind the next ridge. i looked up towards the sky looking for strobes(collision lights) but was unbale to locate. i know it wasn't the wind as there was a little breeze, and i know it wasn't a truck or car as i saw the lights in the sky pass overhead. i was spooked, being way out there in the forest and not having cell coverage and not able to see anything but stars. the next morining we were all awaken by a heliocopter circling the area. not sure what the heliocopter was looking for but it was flying around in the area  the lights headed towards.
content.summary: Around 22:15, i heard a very loud mechanical sound, like an jumbo jet coming in for a landing. i was in an rv and looked out bot was only able to see lights moving low and east.

content.detailedDescription: June/20/2007 1:58pm>i live  in the  bronx n.Y. watching  planes  fly  overhead from  local l>g>a (la guardia airport) new york city with binocculars is a  pastime/hobby >this  particular afternoon a  u.S.Air jet passed  overhead > no big  deal !Until a bell/diamond shape  ''object  '' crosses  my  view while  watching  the  plane. i  quickly focused  on  the  ''object'',it  stopped , hover with  a  shimmer of  light  on  one   side , for  maybe  10 sec.,(no sound ,moving parts,or exaust) then  headed north (from here  n. is  toward  conn.)lost  sight  after house  blocked  my  view ,ran  to  the front  of  the  house   for  a  bettter/2nd   look ,but  disappearred! now  that  i  have  seen  for myself (2 previous times @ night)& now in  broad  daylite ,80d/sunny > i am  investing  in  infrared/night  vision tech.  to  catch  one  on  tape!  p.S.> i  am  your  avg.  guy -this  is  wierd! 41yrs.Old  never  seen an  aircraft  like  this b/4..Ever!!!!!
content.summary: Viewing  plalnes  through  binocculrs

content.detailedDescription: Since every night this week, i have been seeing a lot of action in the sky, i went and bought a camcorder.  3 of us went out on my deck at our usual star-gazing time (around 10pm), and not long after we'd been out, here came two bright lights from the nw.  we all saw them.  it looked like two bright stars, about as bright as venus traveling together at a sychronized distance apart.  flying in formation, i thought, but do planes fly in formation at 10:30 at night with no other lights or sound and then just disappear?  we watched the two bright lights and were all saying.."what is that?" and luckily this time we had the camcorder and got them on tape.  not sure how good it turned out yet, but we got them! it almost looked like one huge object with lights on ends of it.  we weren't sure, but the distance between them stayed very regular until it changed direction (gradually) and looked to be heading south and then just disappeared into the sky and it wasn't that far away.  there was no sound, no other lights and it was a clear sky.  definitely not satellites.  we stayed and watched for planes to compare the difference and every plane that came by, if it was a large plane or small private aircraft had blinking lights and we could very definitely hear engine noise from all the planes that passed unless they were very far away, but then their lights were a lot smaller and not as bright, but we could still tell they were planes and not what we had just witnessed.  planes stayed in vision forever until they turned into such tiny specs that they vanished from being out of sight range.  okay, this is the 2nd night this week i have seen ufo's in the sense that they are unidentified flying objects.  what the heck?  i think the camcorder was a good investment. now, i just gotta figure out how to get it on here.
content.summary: 2 bright lights traveling together and disappeared -got it on video.

content.detailedDescription:
In my backyard last night, my wife, a friend, and i saw two bright lights moving across the night sky from wnw to ese.  one light followed directly behind the other.  as they moved, the lights became increasingly dim until they faded away about 30 degrees (rough estimate) above the horizon.  the distance between the lights also appeared to close as they moved, but this may have been an artifact of an ever acute viewing angle.  the total duration of the sighting was approximately 40 seconds.  

my initial impression was that these were airplanes, but i think this can be ruled out for a few  reasons: 1) there were no blinking navigation lights; 2) there was no engine sound; 3) they seemed moving at an incredible velocity [assuming they were very high in the sky]; 4) the lights faded away on a clear night.  if they were airplanes, they should have been visible all the way to the horizon. 5) they were very bright, much brighter than typical aircraft lighting.

my second thought was that they were satellites reflecting sunlight.  the way they appeared to disappear in the night sky was certainly reminiscent of satellites moving into the earth's shadow.   i am not completely satisfied with this explanation either. first, the lights were larger an much brighter than any satellite i have seen before, and i have seen many.  also, i have never seen satellites that appear to move in tandem in a collinear fashion.  

finally, i wondered if we had seen the space station and shuttle reflecting the sun's light as they orbited overhead.  i just checked the nasa website which reports possible sighting times for both, and it appears that this is very likely what we saw.  both were supposed to pass overhead from nw to ese last night at approximately the time i thought we saw them.
content.summary: Two bright lights moving wnw to ese across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Last night at approximately 11:30pm i was next to the house talking to my son and daughter-in-law when i decided to go back in the house. i casually looked up at the stars while i was walking, and noticed 2 bright stars that seemed to be traveling slowly in tandem across the sky. i then noticed an almost invisible shape surrounding the lights in the form of a blimp shape, or fat cigar. the shape was hard to detect unless you were concentrating on the lights because it blended into the dark sky almost perfectly so as to almost appear invisible. the object was large-the size of 3 or 4 full moons side by side. the object was traveling in a south easterly direction, and had it been a plane or helicopter, the engine noise would have been easily discernable at the height this appeared to be at. this object was totally silent. i quickly told my son and daughter to look up and pointed to the object--they also saw it. they continued to watch as i ran into the house to get my binoculars so i could see it better. by the time i came out and put the binoculars top my face the object lights were already becoming quite dim in the distance-i put the binoculars down in time to see the lights disappear and the object was no longer visible, like it had completely disappeared. there were only 2 white lights at the bottom of the object - almost double the brightness of nearby background stars. no other lights were seen--no colors, not blinking. it was totally silent and large, easily the size of a passenger airliner or bigger.
content.summary: At approximately 11:30pm a large blimp shaped object with 2 white lights on the bottom silently sailed overheadin a southeasterly direction

content.detailedDescription: I took the dog out my front door and while she did her thing i watered the plants on the porch. when i was done, i was noticing what a beautiful night it was and up above my vision i noticed something moving, thinking it might be little private plane, there was no sound. the lights were moving very slow as if one was pulling the other in a straight line. i watched for a few seconds and then ran in the house to get my camera. i wasn't out of sight for more than 10 sec. and when i got back outside, the lights were gone.
content.summary: Two white lights, like one pulling the other slowly about 50 ft apart

content.detailedDescription: Two objects that presented as planes moving quickly from north to south toward and partially across the zennith. the objects were moving in perfect unison perhaps three-four fingers of a fully extended arm apart. conditions were perfectly clear and there were no navigation lights or other lights usually associated with aircraft. we were in a stopped car in the middle of a traffic jam when we noticed the two lights. four of us saw these objects and were discussing it as it was happening. the interesting thing about these lights is that first the lead and then the following light faded out of view completely just after they crossed the zennith. we are all college educated and we all assumed the same thing at the same time: the objects appeared to leave the apmosphere and their light faded as they climbed. definitely ufos.
content.summary: Two airplane like objects moving quickly and in perfect tandom with no navigation lights.

content.detailedDescription: I got a call from a friend and he said to go outside and look tword his house. i live on the mountain across from him and i am at an elevation of 900 and he is at 300 and on the other side of the river. when i looked out at first i saw nothing but then the two lights caught my eye higher than my friend was explaining. my wife was with me and i asked if she saw it and she said yes. they moved across the sky so silent i knew for sure they were not conventional aircraft. they were flying in perfect unison. they were about a dimes size in the sky. i have seen alot of satelites and planes and such at night and can tell you these were neither and they appeared to be lower than the traffic plane that flys by in the day, not much more than 1800 feet elevation. they flew from north to south when i saw them and they disappeared over my sycamore tree in the front yard. i thought if i ran around it i should be able to see them travel the sky south for another five seconds or so but they were gone as soon as i looked back up. the entire time my friend and i were on the phone together and he said they had disappeared from his view too.
content.summary: Two silent dime sized balls of light moving rapid and silent across the sky,
